channel.title: GDC Presentation of Portal 2's original plans
channel.description:
Chet Faliszek and Eric Wolpaw (Both story authors at Valve) have made a presentation about the original plans and early concepts of Portal 2.
They talk about the different, original beginning, original endings, cut competetive multiplayer, the several other characters that should've appeared in the early Portal 2 (Like the Morgan Freeman sphere), changes about the game overall, why they cut Chell, GlaDOS and portals from the original plans for the sequel and much more.
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OLqk4aqpXlQ&feature=player_embedded[/url]
It's one hour long, but really interesting (and funny too), as it also shows, how Valve actually works. (With their playtesting and how they work on their projects)
And there is an Q&A at the end of the presentation.
I hope you enjoy it.

item.title: GDC Presentation of Portal 2's original plans
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

I probably should have written the question down before I got up to ask it haha. I had it phrased in my head but when It was my turn to speak my braid just decided to derp.

lol, " ehhh… ehh… ehh" I would stutter when I face VALVe dudes too

Read full topic

item.title: GDC Presentation of Portal 2's original plans
item.dc:creator: Shepard
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

That’s me at 47:15 asking the really nervous sounding question about the Greek mythology references in the story, as you can probably tell I was quite nervous. Was a really awesome talk overall though, glad I attended it.

Why was you nervous? I mean you haven’t asking about HL3 or something

Read full topic

item.title: GDC Presentation of Portal 2's original plans
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
I liked all parts of it. Too bad they didn’t tie in a harddisk recorder to record the presentation output, and then make a nice montage combining the speakers and presentation. The camera shifting is very annoying, to say the least. Especially the part where you miss an entire video because the camera operator wasn’t paying attention.

Read full topic

item.description:
Chet Faliszek and Eric Wolpaw (Both story authors at Valve) have made a presentation about the original plans and early concepts of Portal 2.

They talk about the different, original beginning, original endings, cut competetive multiplayer, the several other characters that should’ve appeared in the early Portal 2 (Like the Morgan Freeman sphere), changes about the game overall, why they cut Chell, GlaDOS and portals from the original plans for the sequel and much more.
